name: Alessandra Jungs de Almeida
description: Alessandra Jungs de Almeida holds a Ph.D. in International Relations from the Federal University of Santa Catarina (UFSC), Brazil. She is a postdoctoral associate at the Women’s and Gender Studies Program at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT) and an affiliated researcher at the Data + Feminism Lab (MIT). As a feminist scholar, her work focuses on reproductive rights and gender-related violence.
